capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Harry's family history and it turns out he has a pretty interesting mix of magical heritage. His parents were wizards, but his mom also had some Muggle roots, which makes him a half-blood. And then there's the fact that his father, James Potter, was part of the Order of the Phoenix during the whole Voldemort thing, so Harry's got a bit of a complicated family tree, to say the least.
